bugtrap03.bugdomain.bugreport

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.bugdomain.bugreport.Comment

  • public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class representing a comment.
    Author:
    Group 03

      • Comment

        public Comment(User issuer,
               java.lang.String text)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
               PermissionException
        This method initializes an Comment
        Parameters:
        issuer - the issuer that creates this comment
        text - the comment text for this comment
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given creator is not a valid creator for this comment
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permissions
        See Also:
        isValidCreator(User)

      • getAllComments

        public Tree<Comment> getAllComments(Tree<Comment> tree)
        This method returns all comments in this comment (deep search) including this comment.
        Parameters:
        tree - The Tree to add these comments onto. When null a new Tree will be used.
        Returns:
        The tree containing all the comments of this comment.
        See Also:
        Tree.Tree(), Tree.addTree(java.lang.Object)

        Parameters:
        subComments - the list to check
        Returns:
        true if the given PList is valid for this comment

      • addSubComment

        public Comment addSubComment(User creator,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                             PermissionException
        This method makes a Comment object and adds it to the sub-comment list
        Parameters:
        creator - the creator of the comment
        text - the text of the comment
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given parameters are not valid for this comment
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permissions
        See Also:
        Comment(User, String)

      • isValidSubComment

        public boolean isValidSubComment(Comment comment)
        This method checks if the given comment is a valid sub-comment for this comment
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment to check
        Returns:
        true if the given comment is valid as a sub-comment for this comment

      • deleteComment

        public boolean deleteComment(Comment comment)
        Delete the given comment from the list of comments.
        Caution: This does not perform any deep removals nor will it remove comments attached to the removed comment.
        Parameters:
        comment - The comment to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether there was a change.

      • commentsTreeToString

        @Requires(value="top != null")
public static java.lang.String commentsTreeToString(Tree<Comment> top)
                                                                             throws java.lang.ClassCastException
        Get the String form of the given Tree structure. This assumes all objects in the given structure are of type Comment and the top node carries null.
        Parameters:
        top - The Tree structure used to get the String format of.
        Returns:
        The result of converting the Tree structure to a Comment. When
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - When the Tree structure does not contain a Comment object.
